segments.text: I see the girl standing there, just waiting for her cookie like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem worried about the boy falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how focused she is on that jar, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and she’s just standing there, completely trusting him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how bold these kids are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, someone needs to turn off that faucet before the whole kitchen is underwater.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a funny and stressful scene all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
